pl.wiraszka.ZwirekSpaceInvaders

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • pl.wiraszka.ZwirekSpaceInvaders.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Commons

    public class Model
extends Object
implements Commons

    Model in Zwirek Space Invaders

    MVC Model module for the game.
    • Implements game logic.
    • Manages game during play.
    • Informs view about content to show.
    Author:
    Maciej Wiraszka

    • Nested Class Summary

      Inner class with game loop logic.

        private int playerScore
        Actual player score.

      • aliensMoveLeft

        private boolean aliensMoveLeft
        True if now aliens should move left. False if now aliens should move right.

        private int aliensMoveCnt
        Counts number of screen refreshes from last aliens move view refresh. Max defined in interface Commons.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Model

        public Model(View gameView)
        Model constructor.
        • Initiate class fields
        • Create initial game elements.

    • Method Detail

      • insertBoardElements

        private void insertBoardElements()
        Creates initial game elements:
        • Player
        • Aliens in list
        • List for shots

      • setController

        public void setController(Controller controller)
        Parameters:
        controller - MVC Controller of the program

      • getController

        public Controller getController()
        Returns:
        the gameController

      • startGame

        public void startGame()
        Starts the game.
        • Calls View functions for displaying first battlefield view in game.
        • Starts new thread with game loop processed by it.

      • getPlayerScore

        public int getPlayerScore()
        Returns:
        the playerScore

      • playerMoveLeft

        public void playerMoveLeft(boolean b)
        Function called from MVC Controller. Defines actual users's steering (move left) of player.
        Parameters:
        b - true - move left, false - don't move left

      • playerMoveRight

        public void playerMoveRight(boolean b)
        Defines actual users's steering (move right) of player. Function called from MVC Controller.
        Parameters:
        b - true - move right, false - don't move right

      • newPlayerShot

        public void newPlayerShot()
        Create (if possible) new shot made by player. Function called from MVC Controller, when player requests a shot. Add new shot to list and initiate player's reloading.

      • reloadAllAliens

        private void reloadAllAliens()
        Make every alien in aliens list start reloading.

      • movePlayer

        private void movePlayer()
        Move (change coordinates) of player according to actual values of left-right player steering.

      • tryMoveAliens

        private void tryMoveAliens()
        Move (if possible, according to aliensMoveCnt) every alien in aliens list by one place. Frequency of changes defined in interface Commons.

      • movePlayerShots

        private void movePlayerShots()
        Move every player shot in playerShots list. Remove form list every shot that is currently out of the battlefield.

      • checkIfAliensDestroyed

        private void checkIfAliensDestroyed()
        Check if there is any collision between any player's shot and alien. If so, remove the shot and the alien from game model and increase player's score. Is there is no more aliens in the list, inform controller and game loop logic that the game has ended.

      • shotAliens

        private void shotAliens()
        Shot (if possible, according to canShot field in alien class) every alien in aliens list. If alien shoot, initiate reloading.

      • moveAlienShots

        private void moveAlienShots()
        Try to move every existing alien shot. Remove alien shots that are out of the battlefield.

      • checkIfPlayerDestroyed

        private boolean checkIfPlayerDestroyed()
        Check if there is any collision between alien shots and player. If so:
        • Remove the shot.
        • Remove all shots from battlefield.
        • Call function isDestroyed() from player's class (After player is hit, decrease numOfLives and check if he still lives.)
        • If player is destroyed, inform controller and game loop logic that the game has ended.
        Returns:
        true - player is destroyed, false - player is still alive
